title: Kelly Ripa dresses down as she leaves her Halloween decorated NYC home for work
text:
Kelly Ripa looked like she was ready for Halloween when she made her way to work on Live With Kelly And Ryan on Thursday.

Though the 49-year-old star was dressed down, she got into the spirit with a stoop decorated with festive pumpkins.

It was clear that the star was ready for a full day, as she left her home with a cup of coffee.

Spooky! Kelly Ripa looked like she was getting into the Halloween spirit as she stepped out onto her fall decorated stoop on Thursday

Kelly was casual, opting for jeans and a tee shirt instead of her polished on-screen attire.

Simple sneakers rounded out her look.

She carried a sturdy envelope full of papers under her arm while slinging a backpack over her shoulder.

Java: It was clear that the star was ready for a full day, as she left her home with a cup of coffee

Dressed down: Kelly was casual, opting for jeans and a tee shirt instead of her polished on-screen attire

Once she got to the studio Kelly slipped into a purple floral dress.

Both Kelly and Ryan were wearing to color in support of the LGBTQ+ community and in defiance of bullying.

The show's Instagram reposted Ryan's picture of their outfits along with the caption when he explained: 'Wearing purple to support the LGBTQ+ community and shutdown bullying! Always be yourself and spread kindness. It’s a good look on everyone. #SpiritDay #ChooseKindness.'

Purple power! Once she got to the studio Kelly slipped into a purple floral dress in order to show support for the LGBTQ+ community

Bring your parents to work day! During the show Kelly and Ryan were visited by the American Idol host's parents Connie and Gary Seacrest

During the show Kelly and Ryan were visited by the American Idol host's parents Connie and Gary Seacrest.

Hailey Steinfeld also brought her dad along for the fun.

Things wrapped at Kelly and Ryan helped singer Natasha Bedingfield promote her new son Kick It.

Live With Kelly And Ryan airs weekdays on ABC.
